titleStmt.title: Because that to many people, I have seemed to falsify my word and promise,
titleStmt.author: Stafford, Richard, 1663-1703.

notesStmt.note: Title from first line of text.
Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: tight binding, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
